events.message: I received the blender this morning, but it has a large crack on the jar and doesn't work properly.
The customer reported a cracked blender jar and faulty operation which fits the Product Defect category.
Support case has been assigned to agent Emily Davis for handling the reported blender defect.
Hello! This is Emily from support. I am sorry to hear about the broken blender jar you received. Let's get this sorted out.
Could you please provide photos of the crack and any visible damage along with your order number to verify and expedite resolution?
I just sent the pictures. The crack is clearly visible and I am quite disappointed because I was looking forward to using the blender immediately.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement blender free of charge with expedited shipping and include a prepaid return label for the damaged item.
That solution works for me, thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the free expedited shipping and return label.
We have processed your replacement order and emailed the shipping details along with the return label. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your replacement blender and that everything is working well now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and works perfectly. Thanks again for your help and prompt service.
Glad to hear everything is resolved! Closing your support case now, and feel free to reach out if anything else comes up.
